title: prANapatE guNapatE
sahitya:
prANapatE guNapatE gaNapatE dInajanArthihara vallabhE


anupallavi

  jAnhavi dharasita suta navanitE jaga sammOhana mUrtE prakIrtE


caraNam    pAvana pankaja puSpapatE jagatkAraNa mOkSapatE
dEvarAja pUjita jagatpatE bhAva rAga layam dEhi mAmpAhi
			(madhyamakAla)
praNava ratipati mAyA ratipati bhUmi gandhAra mantrapatE
phaNi santuratna kalashAmbOruha suragaNa vandita munigaNa sajjana
